name: IMO-Steps
summary:
_âš  Use card with caution_
A dataset of formal proofs for International Mathematical Olympiad (IMO) problems, formalized in Lean 4.
size: Approximately 17 formalized IMO problems, totaling around 5,880 lines of Lean code.
notes: Includes formal proofs for 14 IMO problems from the miniF2F benchmark and 3 additional problems from IMO 2022 and 2023. The dataset also provides a decomposition into 1,329 lemmas, totaling over 40,000 lines of Lean code, serving as building blocks for the formal proofs.
